item.title: Bangladesh put on cyclone alert
item.description: A low-pressure system over the Bay of Bengal has intensified, with the Bangladesh Meteorological Department (BMD) warning it may develop into a cyclone by Sunday. The system has remained over the same area while moving west-northwest on Saturday evening. Meteorologist Md Omar Faruk told bdnews24.
